website_summaries.verdict: A set designed to mimic a family favorite – camping. It may be a smaller set, but it will likely see a lot of use.
pros: Includes a camp trailer, car, two mini figures, BBQ grill, dog, and hot dogs!
The fun comes in the details with this set that's perfect for those who love simple pastimes
cons: A few boxes arrived with missing pieces

customer_reviews.title: It's a really fun toy and I love almost all legos
customer_reviews.text: It's a really fun toy and I love almost all legos. It's really cool because the rv opens up and everything fits in the car and rv so you don't have to carry anything on the side! It's also cool because it has hot dogs and a dog with a bone. I really enjoyed it for about 2 and a half months. age 9
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn J. Edgerton-Tarpley

customer_reviews.title: Great set with lots of playability.
customer_reviews.text: Great LEGO set... this set comes with everything you need for a fun weekend. The two different vehicles are fairly detailed, and the grill with meat is for sure a two thumbs up. The family pup is also a nice touch. As you can see in my pictures, the set makes a wonderful addition to any LEGO city scene. This set has also been selling for under $15, which makes the piece to price ratio very positive. I give this set a buy rating and think it's a must-have for your LEGO collection. If my review was helpful, please consider clicking 'helpful' below. If you have any questions about this LEGO set, please don't hesitate to ask. Happy bricking.
customer_reviews.author: The LEGO GuyTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: Build and Rebuild
customer_reviews.text: Another gift for the grandson (and his parents) who loves all the LEGO pieces. Grandson is 3-1/2 and these things bring out the engineering creativity he is fast developing. It is all good, especially when the parents work with him.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Let's go camping... Without a tent!
customer_reviews.text: Why would anyone give LEGOs a bad review?! Except for the price of their products... I managed to snag this from the market place for much cheaper. Only problem was a damaged box, but all contents were still there and in great shape. The directions are VERY easy to follow.. as if I actually used those anyway. I don't like tent camping, so having a camper is the best option for me. However, my fiance doesn't want to pay for one. She was much happier with me spending a few dollars on LEGOs... She said I could even take it tent camping with us, so I could pretend that I had a camper.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVE LEGOS AND CAMPING
customer_reviews.text: Just another excellent set to add to our growing Lego collection. My 5 year old plays with this everyday. The side swings open so he can put the Lego minifigures inside to go camping. We also have the RV style camper and now with this one can make a campground! My boys love camping and Legos, so this is the perfect set for them.
customer_reviews.author: Megan N Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great lego find my son was thrilled to get this as a gift. Easy to build great learning fun and for following directions and get the reward of a toy. You can't go wrong with lego sets. This is a good deal with several pieces he kept busy in imagination world!
customer_reviews.author: bootlover

customer_reviews.title: Another great lego vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for a discounted price compared to LEGO store or Toys R Us. I always look for 15% to 20% discounts and compare to the physical LEGO store which is only few miles away. The discounted prices pretty much match the in-store red price stickers. As for the package, they are LEGO so they are awesome. My kid has been blessed and spoiled.
customer_reviews.author: neophyte226

customer_reviews.title: A Good Intermediate Set
customer_reviews.text: We have had a lot of fun with this set. It has movable parts to load and unload, blue van drivers and passengers, and trailer camping activities. Grandpa put the set together initially, with minimal help from grandaughter. Our granddaughter then took over play acting with the mini people, the trailer hitch, opening trailer, and blue van. She particularly enjoyed figuring out the trailer locking mechanism and van/trailer hitch process. She then became a reckless big blue van driver with many trailer accidents. Some of the pieces in this set are very small, but overall, the pieces are larger than the smaller sets --- easier for a 3.5 year old to assemble/disassemble.
customer_reviews.author: Boatbuilder48

customer_reviews.title: Legos comes through again
customer_reviews.text: As usual, lego's has done it again. Made my grandson so happy. He us 5 and he is in love with Legos. The directions for assembly are clear and concise. The pictured directios are something get can do by himself. Attention to detail is super. He loves how every lego item is not just for display, but is truly operational. Can't say enough about this product. Arrived in excelent condition and speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Tweetie

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good fun, rather plain look
customer_reviews.text: Got this for $12 on Amazon and for that price it's more than a great value. I like the minifigures, the dog, the barbecue, etc. The caravan opens up in a nice way to allow access; you can have both figures in it, hanging out. My one complaint is that generally the van looks very plain, like it was made by a kid without instructions. However because the roof is just open studs you can add to it as you see fit. Maybe add some roofracks or some luggage?
customer_reviews.author: NickTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: fun little set
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun build. It has two instruction booklets, so if you're building with a friend/kid/etc you each can work on one thing independently. It has a lot of cool little features, such as coffee maker inside the caravan, opening doors on the van, and so on. Enjoyable set, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goin' up the country!
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Fun to assemble and like LEGO always is - sturdy when built. We received an extra bone and an extra hot dog in our pack. Little details make a such difference and the camper comes with a coffee pot too. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Best_In_Show

customer_reviews.title: REALLY impressive!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed by this particular set. Bought my nephew 12 sets for Christmas, and this one stole the show. Really ingenious engineering and design. We loved building it, but love looking at it and its silly features. The camper opens up to reveal the details of the inside. And the Land Rover-esque vehicle is really neat, too. A great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: flapjackjoe

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 5yo and 11yo just started playing with Legos. We did a lot of camping over the summer so this was a pretty fun set to have. They put it together pretty quickly. They both were able to work on separate parts. It has not been a shelf piece. The 5yo plays with it like any you and it has help up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: TT_22

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set. Like the sets of the ‘olden days’
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Our kids love it. It wasn’t a challenging build for our 4 and 5 year olds, but it did take them a while simply because it has a reasonably large amount of pieces for such a ‘compact’ set. I reminded myself a lot of the sets of old. Mostly uses regular bricks instead of ‘special’ bricks. Recommended for all ages! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Kremer

customer_reviews.title: Road trip!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little set for only $12.99! Fun to put together, with a little vehicle (with opening doors and turning steering wheel) hitched to a cool little trailer (with neat graphics) that opens up to reveal a bed and a tiny coffee maker. The mini figures are awesome and come with a cute little German Shepherd lego dog! (I named him Pants.) Also includes a grill, sausages, two mugs and bones for Pants.
customer_reviews.author: AlienHunter47

customer_reviews.title: LEGO is not just for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set twice. Built one as directed. Built other set with my own modifications, including a pickup rather than a minivan. That is the fun of LEGO.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It was a REAL hit!
customer_reviews.text: It was a real hit with our 7 year old grandson who had never built a kit before. I quickly taught him how to read the easy to understand instructions and away he went. He had a ball, and was so proud of himself. He liked playing with the finished product but said, "That was fun! I could always take it apart and build it again!" He will be getting more Lego kits from us in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila P

customer_reviews.title: ... grandkids to play with in our RV it's just fun for them to play RV Legos in a RV ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the grandkids to play with in our RV it's just fun for them to play RV Legos in a RV easy to put together easy to take apart and put back together each time that they take a trip with us
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Winters

customer_reviews.title: While he is younger than the recommended age, he doesn't put things in his mouth
customer_reviews.text: My two-year-old has been playing with this set daily for over a month. While he is younger than the recommended age, he doesn't put things in his mouth. The camper opens and so do the doors on the car. He loves putting people in driving them around. I also really like that this is an easy enough build that it is quick to reconstruct if it comes apart.
customer_reviews.author: D. Klintworth

customer_reviews.title: We like to camp
customer_reviews.text: We like to camp, especially with our grand son's, they like these themed play sets , especially when it rains and we are all cramped inside, makes for some nice quiet!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Great classic set for someone who enjoys camping
customer_reviews.text: The tiny hot dog is not necessary though. Wanted to just throw it out because I have a small child in the home (choking hazard nonsense and so easy to lose). That aside, looks just like a friend's Honda Element!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn H.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a child at Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Did they like it?? I sure hope so! I think so! They played with it at our house and went back home with it! But doesn’t every child love LEGO? Especially if you pick a themed one they love!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Well, Lego is Lego, so no surprises there ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, Lego is Lego, so no surprises there. But the camping theme particularly attracted me, and it is so well done and realistic. It looks lovely and also gives "space" for play, with the camper opening up and the the barbecue set.
customer_reviews.author: Antonie Kalchevski

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson loved it for his birthday. His older brother who's 7 helped him put the legos together.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Barron

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this for any LEGO collection it is a very neat set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for grandkids to play with at our house and had to buy another one for Grandson for his house
customer_reviews.author: Donnalar

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Another great set from Lego! Lots of fun detail such as the bbq grill with hotdogs and the nook for the dog to ride in the car. My son loves opening up the trailer and "making coffee" with the little coffee machine. Glad we added this set to our collection.
customer_reviews.author: Superdog

customer_reviews.title: Love Legos and this set!
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family loves this set. Our neighbor does, too, as she has dogs and an RV! It's a fun little set at a great price! Legos run about $10 per 100. This one was a great price for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Momtographer

customer_reviews.title: Cute set with fun details. Bought one for my child and another ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute set with fun details. Bought one for my child and another for a gift. Amazing deal for a nice lego set!
customer_reviews.author: chem

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Follow Directions and Great Fun to Play With
customer_reviews.text: Our 3-year old grandson loved this! Of course my husband and I mainly put it together, but he helped quite a bit, following the very easy drawings on each page to find the parts and see where to put them on. We have great fun playing with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Vegan Gourmet

customer_reviews.title: Small but fun!
customer_reviews.text: The LEGO CITY series is great, but this particular set is really fun. The camper is smaller than I was expecting, but it doesn't take away from the fun of putting it together. I have twin 9 year old boys who can put this together with little to no assistance.
customer_reviews.author: LMizell

customer_reviews.title: My wife loved this. We camp in our trailer all the ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this. We camp in our trailer all the time and she has always loved LEGO’s so this was perfect for her
customer_reviews.author: Mike J

customer_reviews.title: Yes, do purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit with the third grade boy I gave it to - purchased as a gift and he went on and on about how much he genuinely liked laying with it. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: informed purchase

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Xmas gift, used still daily. My grandson is lego freak. And his favorites are anything CITY. This was worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. My 4 year old loves it too, so much we bought 2 so we each can have one. It is easy to build and easy to repair, and its a fun set to have since you can modify the trailer and vehicle and it still looks like a camper set.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a LEGO lover.
customer_reviews.text: The product shipped exactly as expected, on time with no visible damages. All pieces were present, with a few duplicates of the really special LEGOs, in case you lost those. Great price and would recommend for someone who wants to buy LEGOs but doesn't want to buy merch for a brand like Star Wars or Batman.
customer_reviews.author: Caleigh

customer_reviews.title: Camping Imagination!
customer_reviews.text: This set was much better than expected. Many little wonderously small items that made it even better and create a far vivid memorable interaction for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Tmc

customer_reviews.title: They had a great time doing it together
customer_reviews.text: My (almost) 5 year old boy built the car and 6 year old girl built the camper. They had a great time doing it together. They then played with them for hours, peacefully! We've enjoyed them so much, I'm going to be getting them for their friend's upcoming birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: FUN, CAMPING LEGO SET!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fun, easy to assemble and great value!! Not many stores had this LEGO set in stock so for the price and prime shipping this was a great find!!
customer_reviews.author: Living The Wanderlust

customer_reviews.title: grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved his lego kit and would order more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: stella

customer_reviews.title: Imaginations ran wild with this set
customer_reviews.text: We buy every Lego set we can afford. All 12 grandchildren play with them. They really like this set because it is so different.
customer_reviews.author: Dodger26

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with this!!! Beautifully designed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic set! The detail in this is just amazing!!! I made this with my four year old son and he just loves it. Love that the camper van opens up at the back too.
customer_reviews.author: Treenz

customer_reviews.title: So cool! Grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.text: The little trailer swings open..surprise! I didnt know it would do that & my 6 yr old Grandson really enjoyed putting this set together & playing with it. I love legos, but some are more to look at once done. This one you can truly play with. Great price for a really fun lego set. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: Great lego set!
customer_reviews.text: With parental supervision, our 4 year old was able to put this together with relative ease. Kids (6 and 4) have actually played with this for months in lieu of dismantling it like they do with most legos. Highly recommended for kids who enjoy camping or trucks/trailers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Assembly and Toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 2.5 year old who is obsessed with Legos. Since it comes in a couple of different bags, we were able to assemble one vehicle one day and the next vehicle the next day without a mess of Legos everywhere. Just opened the package for what we needed that day. After vehicles are assembled they are quite sturdy and provided hours of interaction and entertainment on our trip.
customer_reviews.author: Ian and Whitney Wolf

customer_reviews.title: The camper is nice and i would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 missing pieces. Not only were there missing pieces the colors did not match with the book so therefore gave me a little problem. The camper is nice and i would buy again, just wish parts were all there so i didn't have to dig.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Pitchford

customer_reviews.title: Rally cute set and fun to play with after
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son as a reward on his sticker chart. He loves these lego's he is 5 and follows the directions perfectly and had no problem putting them together. He and his brother loved pulling the camper and driving it around after it was put together. Super cute set!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda RasmusonTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: My son had the best time putting this together and then playing with it
customer_reviews.text: My son had the best time putting this together and then playing with it. It is somewhat sturdy when put together, unlike some of the lego projects, so it can be played with a lot without needing constant touch up work. (until they want to of course!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great Lego
customer_reviews.text: Had fun putting it together with my 10 year old granddaughter, and now the 3 year old loves playing with the car and trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set with cute details
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves this set. It was easy enough for him to put together without any help and it has so many little details. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: He loved building it and loved the role playing with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit with our 9yo son. He loved building it and loved the role playing with the tiny accessories. He made his own modifications and still plays with the “Jeep” frequently.
customer_reviews.author: H. B. Neal

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LEGO SET
customer_reviews.text: GREAT LEGO SET. My son loved this! Wasn't too difficult to put together, came in a timely matter and wasn't missing a single piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: I've always wanted a minifig dog!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old for Christmas. Definitely too hard for him to put together on his own but we love it. The camper is a lot of fun as it swivels open and has a little space inside for a coffee mug.
customer_reviews.author: otiliorules

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: My five year old loves legos. We bought this for him to remember our first camping trip. Was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Lego products always rate 5 stars in my book. ...
customer_reviews.text: Lego products always rate 5 stars in my book. Bought them for my sons and am now buying them for my grandchildren!
customer_reviews.author: K. Miles

customer_reviews.title: Lego van and trailer
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for our 4-year-old grandson. He loved it and was able to put together with the help of an adult. Such cute details too: campfire, trailer and swings open and reveals a bed and little kitchen with coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Brier Lynne

customer_reviews.title: And Away We Go
customer_reviews.text: We own a small RV camper and bought this from Lego because it resembles ours so much. Our grandson loves to pretend he goes to the grocery to buy food for his camper to take a trip..
customer_reviews.author: Duchess

customer_reviews.title: A cute van with a teardrop style camper
customer_reviews.text: Loved the van and coloring. This set is a joy for beginners. Not one piece was missing from the box.
customer_reviews.author: M K

customer_reviews.title: Lego goes camping- so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Get ready for a camping adventure! Set includes a male and female figure and friendly Fido. A grill for hamburgers and hot dogs and the camper has a coffee machine too. Set was easy to assemble with the included instructions. Many hours of play ahead for these campers.
customer_reviews.author: Avinlea

customer_reviews.title: Great value ($7 cheaper than target!)
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this set!!! My son loves how the camper opens up!
customer_reviews.author: MS JULIE BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Love it. My husband sells RV's for a living
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My husband sells RV's for a living, so I purchased this as a "toy" for his office. He is going to bring in shelves and display it on his walls. It went together well and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: worldofdan

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this so badly. Love the price, and it was fun for us to put together. He enjoys getting his LEGOS to go camping.
customer_reviews.author: RockyMtnHikeMom

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old grandson loves it. He really plays ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old grandson loves it. He really plays with it after he assembles it. Needed a bit of parental help but not much. A big success!
customer_reviews.author: mird

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and quick delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we like, lot of time being played with. This has been one of my kids favorite kits to play with. Quick delivery! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: ChickyWidget

customer_reviews.title: He loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered as a gift for my grandson. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Lamoreaux

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: The kids like the set. It was challenging for them being about 4-5 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Millington

customer_reviews.title: Great set with thoughtful details
customer_reviews.text: Great set! My 8-yo put this together on her own very quickly & it has since been one of our most played with Lego creations. My kids usually build the sets & then take them apart to build other things, but not this set. They love it so much as it is. It has really nice details & works really well as a car & camper.
customer_reviews.author: S. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: My 8 eyar old really loved this one
customer_reviews.text: A lot to build and play with here for an under $20 LEGO set. My 8 eyar old really loved this one.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: We put it together and he has had fun playing with the van & camper
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy. I bought this for his 6th birthday and he took it with him to the beach. We put it together and he has had fun playing with the van & camper. It's a good addition to the beach hut that he got as a birthday gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: Real reviews

customer_reviews.title: 5-year Old Stamp of Approval!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice LEGO City kit. Bought for a Secret Santa child & I think it would have been very well-received. My 5-year old son gave it his stamp of approval!!
customer_reviews.author: KellieClod

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for 5-7 year olds.
customer_reviews.text: Very age appropriate. 5-7. Just right for in between preschool blocks and the big LEGO sets. Great that it wasn’t super hero or movie related. Looking for similar sets.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Easy directions to follow
customer_reviews.text: Cute LEGO set that when put together is a van and camper. The camper opens to show the inside like camping and it comes with an adorable coffee pot snd cup and grill complete with hot dogs. The truck doors open too. The dog comes with a bone. Easy directions to follow. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bezz

customer_reviews.title: Super cute Lego!!
customer_reviews.text: Big hit with the birthday boy! Fun build, nice detail, good price
customer_reviews.author: vlr928

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL LEGO SET!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Lego set is SUPER nice!!! Ordered it for our 14 year old son and he just loves it to "pieces!!!" :-) :-) :-)
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Grandson and his dad enjoyed putting this together and placed it with the collections ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandson and his dad enjoyed putting this together and placed it with the collections of many LEGO's purchased at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great set at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great set at a great price. Gave as a summer birthday present - I combined this set with "Goodnight, Campsite" a kids' book highlighting RVs and campers. Gift was a bit hit for a boy who loves camping and Legos.
customer_reviews.author: LSponsler

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for Christmas gifts for our grandsons, ages 4 and 5. They were so excited when they saw the box and had fun putting it together (with help). Now they love pretending to be camping and cooking over the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Peach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good value, fast shipping. This was a Christmas gift for my grandson who loves LEGO's
customer_reviews.author: William Whitehouse

customer_reviews.title: I bought it mostly because I love travel trailers and thought this was a super cute ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 6 year old daughter. I bought it mostly because I love travel trailers and thought this was a super cute set. My daughter liked it as well and it was easy for her to put together on her own. The hot dog, grill and dog are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: He loved it though
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old put this together quicker than I expected; perhaps he's ready for more pieces. He loved it though...
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Grandson collects great toy
customer_reviews.text: my grandson added this to his collection at Christson. loves it
customer_reviews.author: Appliqued Designs by Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loved it. Normal great LEGO quality - same excitation pain when you step on it.
customer_reviews.author: JJ-Dallas

customer_reviews.title: They are still loved by all of them from 4 to 40
customer_reviews.text: Legos have always been a regular gift choice for both my own children and now for my grandchildren. They are still loved by all of them from 4 to 40!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Nice Unit - Will Take Some Time To Put Together
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice piece, but will take some time to put together. My adult son helped my grandson put it together. Quite a few pages of instructions. If I were guessing I would say it took over an hour
customer_reviews.author: D. Robert Friend

customer_reviews.title: A very big set for a pretty small price
customer_reviews.text: A very big set for a pretty small price. Lots of things to build and lots of fun, pretty nifty set for almost the price of a starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Rayfasa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set!
customer_reviews.text: Cute set. It's going into my Lego Village Scene. I'm an AFOL (adult fan of Lego) and I love adding little pieces to my scene that are on the cheaper side.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 5 year old and he love it.
customer_reviews.text: ok you can't go wrong with a Lego City purchase, I bought this for my 5 year old and he love it.
customer_reviews.author: kat mau

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for our 3 year old.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! He specifically wanted a trailer and "truck" and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KSmith

customer_reviews.title: a nice, wholesome toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 5 yr. old great-grandson, We have travel trailer and truck, and go camping in the Sierras with the kids. a nice, wholesome toy!
customer_reviews.author: emily ellen lathlean

customer_reviews.title: Nice, easy Lego set
customer_reviews.text: I have a very happy 5 year old who feels that he spent his birthday money wisely on this Lego set. It was reasonably easy to put together, but not so easy as to be boring.
customer_reviews.author: Bardolater

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, great price, pieces are the right size, delivered early
customer_reviews.author: mary harvey

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift for Young and Old
customer_reviews.text: It's LEGO, what do you expect? Of course it is the best gift for anyone old or young.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kong

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun little project to do with the kids. Really cute and fun because it moves and they can play with it after building.

customer_reviews.title: Fun set for all
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons love this set. They are 4 and 5 years old so their father played with them. The end result was just what they wanted for their collection. The were very happy.

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit!!  Lego are always a favorite.
customer_reviews.text: It was a great gift for my 8 year old grandson. He loved it. It was a great project for grandfather, father, and son. That set was fun for them to put together.

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lego set especially for any kids that love to camp and play that they are camping. My son loved this for Christmas.

customer_reviews.title: Well made LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: As always LEGO does not disappoint. The van and caravan are well made and mys5 years old son had fun building and playing with it.

customer_reviews.text: Very nice little set! My grandson loved it and we put it together with not too much trouble. He just turned 5.

customer_reviews.text: Every child loves Lego, this set is no exception. Perfect gift for a child, dad and grand-dad adventure.

product_meta.title: LEGO City Great Vehicles Van & Caravan 60117 Building Toy
product_meta.description:
Get ready for vacation time! Pack up the grill and food and remember the dog's bone. Bring the coffee maker and drive to the campground in your van, hauling your caravan. Set up the caravan and get ready for fun! Summer camping is great in LEGO City! This cool building toy for creative play includes 2 minifigures.

BRAND STORY
By LEGO
feature_bullets: Build a van and a detachable caravan for a fun outdoor camping and cookout adventure!
Includes male and female campers and pet dog
LEGO City building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Van is over 2” high, 4” long and 2” wide. Caravan is over 2” high, 5” long and 1” wide
250 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 5 and 12 years old
